resources.string: Enter your stored password to continue
A new fingerprint was added to this device, so your password is required.
Screen protection is not set up. setting->security->Please go to the fingerprint recognition and set the fingerprint recognition.
Do you want to terminate Kaiser Wallet?
There is incorrectly entered words. Please enter again.
There is no Ethereum wallet. Please select after creation.
No registered fingerprint. Please register the fingerprint first.
Please recognize the fingerprint to execute Kaiser Wallet. Kaiser Wallet is terminated if cancel.
Overtime. Please run the program again.
You cannot use the App. if you cancel the fingerprint recognition. Program is terminated.
There is coin in the wallet.
Pin number doesn’t match. Retry is possible %d times.
Wordlist doesn’t match. Retry is possible %d times.
Pins are wrong more than 5 times.
Wordlist is wrong more than 5 times.
This is a card which the program isn’t uploaded. Please contact us by e-mail(cs@bizblocks.io).
It is not the Kaiser Card you did tag.
Place the card correctly in the NFC antenna position.
Start key generation procedure. Please touch the card again.
Please select the image QRCODE included.
Please tag the card initially registered wallet information. You tagged a different card.
Please tag the card one more.
Terminate Kaiser Wallet to apply the changed key.
Prepared to restore the key successfully
Completed the key restoration. Finish the App. Try again.
The line is busy. Please wait for a moment.
No fingerprint is registered. Terminate the program.
The selected contract was not deleted.
The format of contract address is not correct.
The Ethereum Wallet does not exist. Please generate the Ethereum Wallet address, first.
The wallet address exists or an error has occurred.
The contract does not exist or the format is wrong. Please add it again after making a confirmation.
The procedure for key generation starts again.\Please touch the card again.
Please enter the 9 numbers recorded in the barcode area at the bottom of the back of the Bluetooth NFC reader.\n(Please turn on the Bluetooth NFC reader power in advance.)
Please try again after KYC verification\n(You can proceed through \'Verification\' on the upper right menu).
Please try again after \'Email verification\' logging in email entered on \'KYCVerification\'.
Please enter precisely the 9 digit numbers in the back of Bluetooth NFC reader.
Please try again after making KaiserCoin Wallet.
Pin numbers are created as \'000000\' at the first use. After that, you can change the pins on the main menu.
Caution) You can\'t use the card any more if you enter the wrong pin numbers 5 times continuously. You can change the card at additional cost.
Please check \'Allow\' on the contact permission.
Configure wallet information from the card.
Your wallet is being registered. Tag your card.
Digital signature is in progress. Tag your card.
Do not connect Bluetooth to Reader devices on Android OS. You must enter S/N to connect.
Please allow\'Camer\' permissions directly in Settings.
Please allow\'Photo\' permission directly in Settings.
